EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_PCF & DynaTrace_PART I_Q117.Invite 2-15-17
EmailTemplate.subject: 3/15 Webinar - Journey to Cloud-Native - Where to Start in Your App Modernization Process
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Initiatives to modernize applications to a cloud-native architecture begin with big questions - where do I start, what applications would require the most changes, and what is the user impact?
Join Mike Villiger from Dynatrace and Kamala Dasika from Pivotal <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/journey-to-cloud-native-where-to-start-in-your-app-modernization-process?utm-source=pivotal-email&utm-medium-email-link&utm-campaign=cloudnative-dynatrace-q117]]> as they take you step-by-step from planning through scoping strategies, so you can begin your app modernization journey today. In this webinar, you will learn how to:
- Discover dependencies in your applications - Identify parts of your applications that are good candidates for refactoring - Minimize customer impact during migration - Deliver business value through measurable digital transformation
Webinar Details: Date: Wednesday, March 15 Time: 9:00am PDT / 12:00pm EDT (USA-California UTC-7hrs)
Save My Seat <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/journey-to-cloud-native-where-to-start-in-your-app-modernization-process?utm-source=pivotal-email&utm-medium-email-link&utm-campaign=cloudnative-dynatrace-q117]]>
Speakers: Kamala Dasika, Pivotal Mike Villiger, Dynatrace
We look forward to you joining us.
The Pivotal Team
